name: John Carter
routine: John is usually in bed by 12am after watching late-night shows and is up by 7:30am to jog before work.
occupation: John is an American political journalist working for a major news network. His hours are irregular, often involving late nights.
thoughts: John is preoccupied with the latest political scandal and is gathering information to write an exclusive article to be published next Monday.
lifestyle: John's lifestyle is fast-paced with many social events. He prefers high-protein meals and often dines out. He seldom cooks but loves barbecuing on weekends.

name: Aleksey Chernov
routine: Aleksey Chernov sleeps at 12am and wakes at 7am to walk his dog.
occupation: Aleksey is a computer security analyst who works a standard 9 am to 5 pm day.
thoughts: He is anxious about a server breach his company faced and has been working extra hours since February 1st, 2024, to resolve the situation.
lifestyle: He prefers hearty Russian meals, relaxes by ice fishing on weekends, and has a functional and straightforward home setup.
